ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A contact_ratio_representation is a type of that represents the ratio of contact between an object and a measuring_gauge.
For more information, see ARM definition of Contact_ratio.

Each instance of contact_ratio_representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items. This representation_item shall be of type measure_representation_item or of type value_range and it shall have a name of 'ratio value'.

Each instance of contact_ratio_representation shall be referenced as the used_representation by exactly one property_definition_representation that has a name of 'contact ratio reference'. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a physically_modelled_product_definition.

Each instance of contact_ratio_representation shall be referenced by exactly one property_definition_representation. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a property_definition that is the derived_definition of a general_property_association that refers as base_definition to a general_property with a name of 'surface_condition'.
A hardness_representation is a type of that represents the hardness of an object. For more information, see ARM definition for Hardness.

Each instance of hardness_representation shall contain between two and four representation_items in its set of items. These representation_items shall either be of type descriptive_representation_item and have a name of either 'measuring method' or 'measuring position', or shall be of type measure_representation_item or value_range and have a name of either 'depth' or 'hardness'.
Each instance of hardness_representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'measuring method'.
Each instance of hardness_representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'hardness'.
Each instance of hardness_representation shall contain at most one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'measuring position'.
Each instance of hardness_representation shall contain at most one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'depth'.

Each instance of hardness_representation shall be referenced by exactly one property_definition_representation. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a property_definition that is the derived_definition of a general_property_association that refers as base_definition to a general_property with a name of 'surface_condition'.

A physically_modelled_product_definition is a type of product_definition that provides a model of the shape of a part made from a certain material, like clay or wood, at a certain scale.
A Physical_model may be used to get an impression of the future appearance of a product.
The frame_of reference name shall be 'physical model occurrence'.
The physically_modelled_product_definition shall be a definition of a product of category 'document'.

A surface_texture_representation is a type of that represents a surface texture such as roughness or waviness. The kind of surface texture that is represented is given in the names of the representation_items.
The method or standard according to which the surface texture is represented is specified in the description of the descriptive_representation_item.
For more information, see ARM definition of Surface_texture.
Each instance of surface_texture_representation shall contain only representation_items that are of type measure_representation_item, value_range, or descriptive_representation_item.
Each instance of surface_texture_representation shall contain exactly one descriptive_representation_item. The name of this descriptive_representation_item shall be 'measuring method'.
Each instance of surface_texture_representation shall contain at least one measure_representation_item or value_range.

Each instance of surface_texture_representation shall be referenced by at most one representation_relationship. If such a relationship is present, the surface_texture_representation shall be the rep_1 and the rep_2 shall be a representation whose name is 'measuring direction'.

Each instance of surface_texture_representation shall be referenced by exactly one property_definition_representation. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a property_definition that is the derived_definition of a general_property_association that refers as base_definition to a general_property with a name of 'surface_condition'.

A tactile_appearance_representation is a type of that represents the tactile appearance of an object.
For more information see ARM definition of Tactile_appearance.
Each instance of tactile_appearance_representation shall only representation_items of type measure_representation_item or value_range in its set of items.
At most one representation_item in the set of items shall have a name of 'depth'.

Each instance of hardness_representation shall be referenced by exactly one property_definition_representation. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a property_definition that is the derived_definition of a general_property_association that refers as base_definition to a general_property with a name of 'surface_condition'.

A visual_appearance_representation is a type of that representats the visual appearance of an object.
For more information see ARM definition of Visual_appearance.

Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain between two and five representation_items in its set of items. These representation_items shall be of type descriptive_representation_item and have a name of 'colour id', 'colour name', 'lustre', 'pattern', or 'transparency'.
Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'colour id'.
Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'lustre'.
Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain at most one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'colour name'.
Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain at most one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'pattern'.
Each instance of visual_appearance_representation shall contain at most one representation_item in its set of items that has a name of 'transparency'.

Each instance of hardness_representation shall be referenced by exactly one property_definition_representation. This property_definition_representation shall relate the representation with a property_definition that is the derived_definition of a general_property_association that refers as base_definition to a general_property with a name of 'surface_condition'.

The restrict_representation_for_surface_condition rule enforces that the instance of that provides the values of a particular kind of surface condition be associated with the appropriate instance of property_definition.

there shall not be any instance of property_definition_representation such that the represented property identifies a particular kind of surface condition and such the used_representation is not the representation appropriate for this kind of surface condition.
The restrict_treatment_result rule constrains the content of a that fulfills the requirement of a Treatment_result.
Each instance of that has a name of 'treatment result' shall contain at most 2 representation_items in its set of items. These representation_items shall be of type descriptive_representation_item.
Exactly one representation_item shall have a name of 'result'.
At most one representation_item shall have a name of 'purpose'.
The material_for_coating_layer rule constrains instances of shape_aspect with name 'coating layer', to be referred to by exactly one material_designation that specifies the material they are made of.
There shall not be any instance of shape_aspect with name 'coating layer' that is not referred to by exactly one material_designation.

The surface_condition_correlation function returns FALSE if, in the case where the name attribute of an instance of property_definition is one of the names associated with the representation of surface conditions, the instance of representation has a different name.
If the names are the same, the function returns TRUE. If the name of the property_definition is not in the list of names of surface conditions, the function returns UNKNOWN.
The that is considered.
The that is considered.
